name: Barracks
body:
### Why Barracks ?
[Barracks](http://barracks.io) provides painless IoT fleet management.
Wether you are building your first connected object or have tens of millions of devices, we will help you manage your software updates.

### Barracks SDKs
We are happy to offer you free and open-source SDKs for the many platforms you may be using !
Have a look at our awesome documentation and start integrating our service in your apps :
* [Android Client](https://github.com/barracksiot/android-client)
* [iOS / OSX Client](https://github.com/barracksiot/ios-osx-client)

### Bug reports and enhancements
If you happen to find a bug, or feel the need to have new features in our SDKs, feel free to submit an issue or a pull request in the related project.

### Support
We will not provide support through Github, though feel free to ask for help on [StackOverflow, using the 'barracks' tag.](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/barracks)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
